Planet Hive

Add to Favorites
Planet Hive
Innovating Automation
4.9

Newark, Delaware, United States

10-49

2024

Are you frustrated by low website traffic, poor search rankings, or lackluster online sales? Planet Hive specializes in solving these exact problems. Navigating the complex world of SEO can be overwhelming—that's where we come in.

Your Challenges, Our Solutions

Low Website Traffic? We conduct comprehensive technical SEO audits to fix issues like crawl errors, slow page speeds, and mobile responsiveness problems, ensuring search engines can effectively find and rank your site.

Poor Search Rankings? Our targeted keyword and on-page optimization strategies will help you climb search engine rankings for the terms your customers are searching for.

Lack of Quality Leads? Through off-page SEO and backlink building, we'll enhance your site's authority, attracting more qualified traffic and potential customers.

Struggling with Local Visibility? Our local SEO services, including Google My Business optimization and local keyword targeting, will put your business on the map.

Why Choose Planet Hive?

Customized Strategies: We craft personalized SEO plans tailored to your specific business goals and industry.
Data-Driven Results: Using advanced tools like SEMrush, Ahrefs, and Google Analytics, we make informed decisions that drive measurable growth.
Expert Team: Our seasoned professionals are skilled in the latest SEO techniques, ensuring you stay ahead of the competition.

Our Comprehensive Services

Technical SEO: Fix crawl errors, improve site speed, and optimize for mobile.
On-Page SEO: Optimize meta tags, content, and URL structures for better rankings.
Off-Page SEO: Build high-quality backlinks to increase domain authority.
Keyword Strategy: Identify and target the most effective keywords for your business.
Local SEO: Enhance your visibility in local search results to attract nearby customers.
Content Strategy: Create and optimize content that engages users and ranks well.
Analytics & Reporting: Monitor performance with regular reports and adjust strategies as needed.

Take the First Step Toward SEO Success

Don't let competitors outrank you. Partner with Planet Hive and transform your online presence. We'll handle the complexities of SEO so you can focus on running your business.

Ready to Get Started?

Contact us today for a free consultation and discover how we can tailor our SEO solutions to meet your unique needs. Let's unlock your business's full potential together.

Success stories
E-commerce Business with Large Inventory Challenge

$5,000

2023

9 months

Challenge

The client had a large warehouse with over 10,000 SKUs across various Home Goods categories. They struggled to digitize their inventory efficiently, lacked visibility online, and had no system to track stock effectively, resulting in lost sales opportunities and inefficient warehouse management.

Solution

We migrated their 10,000+ SKUs online, implementing comprehensive SEO strategies: technical SEO to improve crawlability, optimized product descriptions for higher rankings, and structured data for better search appearance. We built an inventory management system, linking their local stock with the online store, significantly boosting catalog visibility and sales.

Result

Our solution led to a 60% increase in product visibility and a noticeable boost in organic traffic within six months. Inventory tracking efficiency improved by 75%, reducing stock discrepancies. The client experienced a 45% increase in conversions, with the entire catalog now readily accessible to customers, greatly improving order fulfillment accuracy and customer satisfaction.

Technical SEO Optimization for a Next.js Project

$3,000

2024

1 months

Challenge

The client’s website, built on Next.js, faced significant technical SEO issues—broken links, poor crawlability, missing meta tags, and inconsistent schema markup—that hindered its search engine visibility and organic traffic potential.

Solution

We resolved all technical SEO errors by improving URL structure, adding meta tags, fixing broken links, and implementing structured data for rich snippets. We also optimized page load speed and utilized server-side rendering features of Next.js for better SEO. These changes enabled search engines to crawl and rank the site more effectively.

Result

The client's website experienced a 70% boost in organic search visibility within 3 months. Technical fixes improved page load speeds by 40%, leading to a 25% decrease in bounce rate. Consistent indexing led to the site ranking for targeted keywords, significantly increasing qualified traffic and customer inquiries.

Exponential Growth for the Fragrance Ecommerce

$5,000

2023

13 months

Challenge

We had to get the entire inventory of Fragrances in a Brick and Mortar store and only data available were Barcode. We had to set up omnichannel sales, and entire business process from scratch, from bringing traffic to CRO and social media integration and management to making high Quality Content

Solution

We have done high quality product listing with images for almost 6000 products, raised traffic and actual sales improvement. Sales funnel, automated marketing and email marketing, research, creation of high quality content, promoting social media. Experience has been exhilirating

Result

Bounce rate has been drastically reduced from 89% to 22%, Engagement has improved considerably from 7seconds to 2 min 25 second, conversion has considerably improved and its consistently rising even though we're seeing increased traffic still our conversion ratio hasn't dropped, which is 2% now
